title.rendered: Drug & Alcohol Rehab Near Hatfield, Hertfordshire

content.rendered:
Drug & Alcohol Rehab Near Hatfield

Help for addiction is available just 20 minutes from Hatfield. Abbington House offers safe, private residential detox and rehab in Hertfordshire with therapy that treats the root cause of drug and alcohol addiction.

Call 03000 616161

Just a Short Journey from Hatfield

Hatfield residents can access residential treatment at Abbington House in just 20 minutes. Whether you’re searching for help with alcohol, drugs or dual diagnosis, our private rehab centre near Hatfield provides a calm and comfortable setting to begin recovery.
Call Our Admissions Team

Why Choose Abbington House?

Medically Managed Detox (If Needed)

For those physically dependent on substances like alcohol or opiates, a safe medical detox is often the first step. We work with a team of clinical experts to ensure withdrawal is as comfortable and safe as possible.

Trauma-Informed Therapy

Our team understands how trauma, stress and mental health often drive addiction. Every part of our programme - from therapy to aftercare - is built with emotional safety at its core.

Comfortable Residential Setting

We’re based in a private, welcoming house just outside Hatfield. Clients enjoy peaceful surroundings, home-cooked meals and spacious bedrooms to help you settle and focus on your recovery.

Personalised Support

Our small team of experienced therapists and addiction professionals offers a personalised experience, you won’t be lost in the crowd here. Every care plan is tailored to your needs.

Family Involvement

We know how addiction impacts loved ones. That’s why we offer optional family support sessions, regular updates (if you want them), and advice for rebuilding trust and connection.

Long-Term Recovery Focus

Recovery doesn’t stop when rehab ends. Our discharge planning and aftercare support help you stay on track after you leave with relapse prevention and connection to ongoing support via Alumni.

Local Addiction Help in Hatfield

If you live in Hatfield or the surrounding area, Abbington House is a local, accessible option for private rehab. We welcome clients from:

  1. Hatfield Town Centre
  2. Birchwood and South Hatfield
  3. Roe Green and Oxlease
  4. Welham Green and Brookmans Park
  5. The University of Hertfordshire community

What We Treat at Abbington House

  1. Alcohol addiction
  2. Cocaine and crack cocaine use
  3. Prescription drug misuse (e.g. painkillers, benzodiazepines)
  4. Cannabis addiction
  5. GHB and chemsex recovery
  6. Process addictions like gambling and porn
  7. Dual diagnosis and mental health support

What to Expect at Our Private Rehab Near Hatfield

Our residential treatment programme typically includes:

  1. Initial assessment and personalised care planning
  2. One-to-one therapy with qualified addiction and trauma specialists
  3. Group therapy and psychoeducational workshops
  4. Detox with 24/7 support (if required)
  5. Trauma and mental health-informed care
  6. Holistic therapies like yoga, mindfulness and breathwork
  7. Discharge planning and aftercare coordination.
Alcohol Rehab Services Near Hatfield

Safe, Private Accommodation Near Hatfield

Clients stay in our welcoming, peaceful home near Letchworth Garden City. Every room is bright, secure and fully furnished. 

Nutritious meals are cooked on site, and the home is kept clean, calm and warm throughout your stay.

Admissions and Availability

We aim to make the process as simple and stress-free as possible:

  1. Speak to our team for confidential advice
  2. We’ll carry out a quick assessment to ensure we’re the right fit.
  3. Admissions can often happen within 24–72 hours.

Frequently Asked Questions

How do I Get to Abbington House from Hatfield

We’re just a short drive from Hatfield — and we’ll support you every step of the way.

Most clients from Hatfield reach us by car in under 25 minutes. We’re located in a quiet residential area just outside Letchworth Garden City, offering a peaceful setting without being far from home.

By Car
Approximate journey time: 20–25 minutes

Take the A1(M) northbound

Exit at Junction 9 for Letchworth Garden City

Our team will provide full directions after your assessment

By Train
Trains run regularly from Hatfield Station to Letchworth Garden City (with a change at Stevenage)

Total journey time: Around 45–60 minutes

Do you help people with mental health issues too?

Absolutely. Many of our clients have depression, anxiety, ADHD or past trauma. We tailor your therapy to address all aspects of your wellbeing.

Take the First Step Today

If you live in or near Hatfield and are considering private addiction treatment, Abbington House offers a peaceful, professional, and person-centred place to begin. Whether it’s your first time in rehab or you’ve tried before, our doors are open. Reach out today for a free, confidential chat with our admissions team. We’ll listen, answer your questions, and guide you - step by step.
Call 03000 616161
